name: vida-verde-website
description: Website acessível da ONG Vida Verde - Preservação Ambiental em Minas Gerais

scripts.build:advanced: npm run minify && npm run compress-images
scripts.minify:css: cleancss -O1 assets/css/*.css -o dist/css/styles.min.css || echo 'CSS minification skipped'
scripts.minify:js: uglifyjs assets/js/*.js -o dist/js/scripts.min.js -c -m || echo 'JS minification skipped'
scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js

author: Fábio Lopes de Andrade
